Help me restore the roots of freedom to the First District and some common sense public service to Washington. They resolved it then and I resolve it to you today as we remember what it means to be first in freedom. Happy Halifax resolves day! #NC01 #ncpol #FirstInFreedom

we have an overbearing government bureaucracy that makes parents criminals with a government-controlled, top-down, we-know-best approach.

This isn't what the courageous people of Halifax wanted then, nor now.

When they wanted to exert strength in the world, Joe Biden is exhibiting weakness. When they wanted a country where their individual dreams could grow and flourish, where parents had the right and responsibility to educate their children in ways that reflected their values,

The patriots signing the #HalifaxResolves made North Carolina first in Freedom. With all of the trials and hardships they faced, could they even recognize the country we have today? https://t.co/jeWYSAga7G
